# init(closestToAzimuth:)

**Initializer**

Creates a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/SquareAzimuth] case with an orientation that has a horizontal angle closest to the provided azimuth.

## Declaration

```swift
init(closestToAzimuth azimuth: Angle)
```
title: init(closestToAzimuth:)
